medzone_description: A platform for medical professionals and students to connect, share knowledge, and access resources.

how_do_i_reset_my_password: How do I reset my password?
answer_reset_password: You can reset your password from the login screen by clicking 'Forgot Password'. An email will be sent to your registered address with instructions.
how_can_i_report_a_post_or_user: How can I report a post or user?
answer_report_content: To report a post or user, click the three-dot menu (...) on the post or profile and select 'Report'. Our moderation team will review it.
